forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 12C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 54F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High 52F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 48F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. High 14C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High 57F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain likely. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 12C. SW winds shifting to NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 54F. SW winds shifting to NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low near 5C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 42F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High around 10C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 51F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 3C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 38F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 11C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 51F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 2C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 36F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny. High 11C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 52F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 53F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 42F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 12C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 54F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening with some clearing overnight. Low 6C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening with some clearing overnight. Low 43F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. High 12C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. High 54F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 6C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening with some clearing overnight. Low 42F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
